title: Gab & Juls Show: Can Brazil end 20-year World Cup wait?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens are joined by Luis Miguel Echegaray to discuss Brazil’s chances ahead of the 2022 World Cup. The guys debate whether there are any obvious weaknesses in the side, and whether Neymar could write his name into Brazilian football history. The guys also discuss England’s 3-3 draw with Germany, Chelsea’s FIFA 23 blunder & if there are reasons to worry at Inter Milan.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Breakdown of Brazil; England's issues; Cristiano era officially over?
